attacks.name: Centrifugal Force
attacks.effect: Does 20 damage times the number of Colorless Energy in the Defending Pokémon's Retreat Cost (after applying effects to the Retreat Cost).

attacks.name: Swirling Ripple
attacks.effect: If your opponent has any Water Pokémon in play, this attack does 30 damage plus 30 more damage and the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.
